content: tina cowl is inspired by the tv show the bear tina is one of my favorite characters and i was so moved by her in the episode called napkins where she wore this hand knit cowl i looked online and did a google image search but couldn t find anything specific ravelry had forums trying to re-engineer it i had to figure it out i went to a miss babs trunk show at skein yarn shop in east greenwich ri and found this color right away it was meant to be knit in the round inside out this cowl is reversible and can be worn either way i hope that liza colón-zayas feels the love of all her fans yarn 1 skein approx 350 yards/320 meters total of worsted weight yarn knit in miss babs big silk color harvest plenty needles size us 9/5 5mm needle or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 19 stitches in the round = 4 /10cm on size us 9/5 5mm needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch markers scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends techniques long tail cast on knit purl abbreviations k - knit p - purl sts - stitches pm - place marker sm - slip marker
